channel.title: Excel on Automaly
channel.description: Recent content in Excel on Automaly

item.title: File upload sysoperation
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Complete X++ code examples for implementing file upload functionality in Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations using SysOperation framework. Supports CSV and Excel file processing with batch capabilities.

item.title: A good example of Trace Parser, Visual Studio and Excel
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Real-world troubleshooting example using Trace Parser, Visual Studio, and Excel to solve Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations issues. Complete methodology for analyzing duplicate record errors and SQL traces.

item.title: A good tip of using Excel to analyse INSERT INTO statement captured in a Trace file
item.author: luan52@outlook.com (Max Nguyen)
item.description: Practical tip for using Excel to analyze INSERT INTO statements from D365 Finance Operations trace files for better SQL debugging and troubleshooting.
